price: 56. Mais ils ne s’en souviendront que si Allah le veut, Lui le Seul digne d’être craint, Lui le plus digne de pardonner.
arabic: وَمَا يَذۡكُرُونَ إِلَّآ أَن يَشَآءَ ٱللَّهُۚ هُوَ أَهۡلُ ٱلتَّقۡوَىٰ وَأَهۡلُ ٱلۡمَغۡفِرَةِ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: wamā yadhkurūna illā an yashāa al-lahu huwa ahlu al-taqwā wa-ahlu al-maghfirati
